description: Gets a list of slots that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the slot.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot that contains the slot.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the slots to list. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: intentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the intent that contains the slot.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Determines the sort order for the response from the ListSlots operation. You can choose to sort by the slot name or last updated date in either ascending or descending order. The attribute to use to sort the list. The order to sort the list. You can choose ascending or descending.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The attribute to use to sort the list.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order to sort the list. You can choose ascending or descending.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Provides the specification of a filter used to limit the slots in the response to only those that match the filter specification. You can only specify one filter and only one string to filter on. (dict) --- Filters the response from the ListSlots operation. The name of the field to use for filtering. The value to use to filter the response. (string) --- The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListSlots operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListSlots operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to use for filtering.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The value to use to filter the response.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListSlots operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListSlots operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the slots.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the slots.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The language and locale of the slots in the list.

nested_items.name: intentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the intent that contains the slots.

nested_items.name: slotSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the slots that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter of the request. If there are more slots available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: slotId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the slot.

nested_items.name: slotName
nested_items.description: The name given to the slot.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the slot.

nested_items.name: slotConstraint
nested_items.description: Whether the slot is required or optional. An intent is complete when all required slots are filled.

nested_items.name: slotTypeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the slot type that defines the values for the slot.

nested_items.name: valueElicitationPromptSpecification
nested_items.description: Prompts that are sent to the user to elicit a value for the slot.

nested_items.name: messageGroups
nested_items.description: A collection of messages that Amazon Lex can send to the user. Amazon Lex chooses the actual message to send at runtime.

nested_items.name: plainTextMessage
nested_items.description: A message in plain text format.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The message to send to the user.

nested_items.name: customPayload
nested_items.description: A message in a custom format defined by the client application.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The string that is sent to your application.

nested_items.name: ssmlMessage
nested_items.description: A message in Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML).

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The SSML text that defines the prompt.

nested_items.name: imageResponseCard
nested_items.description: A message that defines a response card that the client application can show to the user.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title to display on the response card. The format of the title is determined by the platform displaying the response card.

nested_items.name: subtitle
nested_items.description: The subtitle to display on the response card. The format of the subtitle is determined by the platform displaying the response card.

nested_items.name: imageUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of an image to display on the response card. The image URL must be publicly available so that the platform displaying the response card has access to the image.

nested_items.name: buttons
nested_items.description: A list of buttons that should be displayed on the response card. The arrangement of the buttons is determined by the platform that displays the button.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text that appears on the button. Use this to tell the user what value is returned when they choose this button.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value returned to Amazon Lex when the user chooses this button. This must be one of the slot values configured for the slot.

nested_items.name: variations
nested_items.description: Message variations to send to the user. When variations are defined, Amazon Lex chooses the primary message or one of the variations to send to the user.

nested_items.name: plainTextMessage
nested_items.description: A message in plain text format.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The message to send to the user.

nested_items.name: customPayload
nested_items.description: A message in a custom format defined by the client application.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The string that is sent to your application.

nested_items.name: ssmlMessage
nested_items.description: A message in Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML).

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The SSML text that defines the prompt.

nested_items.name: imageResponseCard
nested_items.description: A message that defines a response card that the client application can show to the user.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title to display on the response card. The format of the title is determined by the platform displaying the response card.

nested_items.name: subtitle
nested_items.description: The subtitle to display on the response card. The format of the subtitle is determined by the platform displaying the response card.

nested_items.name: imageUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of an image to display on the response card. The image URL must be publicly available so that the platform displaying the response card has access to the image.

nested_items.name: buttons
nested_items.description: A list of buttons that should be displayed on the response card. The arrangement of the buttons is determined by the platform that displays the button.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text that appears on the button. Use this to tell the user what value is returned when they choose this button.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value returned to Amazon Lex when the user chooses this button. This must be one of the slot values configured for the slot.

nested_items.name: maxRetries
nested_items.description: The maximum number of times the bot tries to elicit a response from the user using this prompt.

nested_items.name: allowInterrupt
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user can interrupt a speech prompt from the bot.

nested_items.name: messageSelectionStrategy
nested_items.description: Indicates how a message is selected from a message group among retries.

nested_items.name: promptAttemptsSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the advanced settings on each attempt of the prompt.

nested_items.name: allowInterrupt
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: allowInterrupt
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the user can interrupt a speech prompt attempt from the bot.

nested_items.name: allowedInputTypes
nested_items.description: Indicates the allowed input types of the prompt attempt.

nested_items.name: allowAudioInput
nested_items.description: Indicates whether audio input is allowed.

nested_items.name: allowDTMFInput
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DTMF input is allowed.

nested_items.name: audioAndDTMFInputSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings on audio and DTMF input.

nested_items.name: startTimeoutMs
nested_items.description: Time for which a bot waits before assuming that the customer isn't going to speak or press a key. This timeout is shared between Audio and DTMF inputs.

nested_items.name: audioSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings on audio input.

nested_items.name: maxLengthMs
nested_items.description: Time for how long Amazon Lex waits before speech input is truncated and the speech is returned to application.

nested_items.name: endTimeoutMs
nested_items.description: Time for which a bot waits after the customer stops speaking to assume the utterance is finished.

nested_items.name: dtmfSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings on DTMF input.

nested_items.name: maxLength
nested_items.description: The maximum number of DTMF digits allowed in an utterance.

nested_items.name: endTimeoutMs
nested_items.description: How long the bot should wait after the last DTMF character input before assuming that the input has concluded.

nested_items.name: deletionCharacter
nested_items.description: The DTMF character that clears the accumulated DTMF digits and immediately ends the input.

nested_items.name: endCharacter
nested_items.description: The DTMF character that immediately ends input. If the user does not press this character, the input ends after the end timeout.

nested_items.name: textInputSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings on text input.

nested_items.name: startTimeoutMs
nested_items.description: Time for which a bot waits before re-prompting a customer for text input.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last date and time that the slot was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListSlots operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListSlots operation request to get the next page of results.
